name: Random Hacks Library Documentation
tagline: API documentation for my open source libraries.
body:
This site contains documentation for several of my open source libraries, though not all are linked at the top level. A few examples:

* [substudy](/substudy/). Learning foreign languages using media and bilingual subtitles.
* [rust-cld2](/rust-cld2/). Rust wrapper for cld2, a compact language detection library.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
